review: I have been able to really use it yet as it keeps losing the wi-fi connection it needs to work.
author: Daniel Gibson Jr

review: Would give zero stars if it was an option. Worked once, upgraded my router and now the thing won't connect. Wishing I had read more reviews, garbage.UpdateAfter a few hours, I read in the blog-o-sphere try FACTORY RESET, not just restart. Worked. Maybe that would be good information to have on the support page..?
author: Tim B.

review: Fire stick is ok but has a few flaws.1st  I needed the font larger but no way to enlarge. 2nd I can't get the search to work,and 3rd  there is no standard def movies like I get on the Desk top so movies cost more.

review: It's perfect. A slick, easy-to-learn interface, and everything plays off it well.
